extensionDescription.message: Identity Chooser helps you to choose the correct identity when composing a new email, replying to one or forwarding it.

options_icEnableComposeMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Writing a New Email

options_icEnableReplayMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Replying to an Email

options_icEnableForwardMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Forwarding an Email

options_restart.hint.message: Hint: If you change any of these options you may need to restart Thunderbird

options_sortOrder.hint.message: Resort the identities here using drag and drop. You can hide an identity from Identity Chooser's menu by unchecking the email address here:

options_icWarnColorsHint.message:
If you want to show a colorful border around the "+ New Message" window, so you can tell different identities apart, I recommend the addon Border Colors D[1]. Identity Chooser detects an installed copy of Border Colors D and integrates with it intelligently.

[1] https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/bordercolors-d/
